name: Lightbox Pop – Responsive Lightbox
author: xyzscripts.com

sections.description:
A quicklook into Lightbox Pop

★ Create responsive or fixed dimension popup lightbox
★ Full control on popup content
★ Standard WordPress content editor
★ Display position and dimension control
★ Timeout based popup display
★ Display based on browsed number of pages
★ Css settings like color, z-index, overlay opacity, border etc
★ Option to exclude lightbox for logged in users
★ Shortcode for displaying popup in specific pages
★ Display specificaly in pages/posts/home page

This plugin allows you to create a responsive or fixed dimension lightbox popup with custom contents. You can customize the popup display by configuring various settings such as position settings (height, width, top,left), display logic settings (time delay after page load, number of pages to browse, lightbox repeat interval) and style settings(z-index, overlay opacity, color, border etc). You can use the plugin to display any type of contents such as special promotions, subscription forms, social media icons, feedback forms, video presentations and much more.

Want more features ?

Check out the premium version of Lightbox Pop.

About

Lightbox Pop is developed and maintained by XYZScripts. For any support, you may contact us.

★ Lightbox Pop User Guide
★ Lightbox Pop FAQ

More Information

★ Lightbox Pop User Guide
★ Lightbox Pop FAQ

Troubleshooting

Please read the FAQ first if you are having problems.

Requirements

Server

WordPress 2.8+
PHP 5+ (Recommended)

Client

IE 7+, FireFox 2+, Chrome, Safari 3+, Opera 8+

Feedback

We would like to receive your feedback and suggestions for the betterment of this plugin. You may submit them at our support desk.
sections.installation:
★ Lightbox Pop User Guide
★ Lightbox Pop FAQ

  1. Extract lightbox-pop.zip to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. In the admin panel under plugins activate Lightbox Pop.
  3. You can configure the settings from XYZ Lightbox menu.
  4. It should now be completely set up and functional.

If you need any further help, you may contact our support desk.
sections.faq:
★ Lightbox Pop User Guide
★ Lightbox Pop FAQ

Installation Instructions

★ Lightbox Pop User Guide
★ Lightbox Pop FAQ

  1. Extract lightbox-pop.zip to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. In the admin panel under plugins activate Lightbox Pop.
  3. You can configure the settings from XYZ Lightbox menu.
  4. It should now be completely set up and functional.

If you need any further help, you may contact our support desk.

1. What is a “lightbox” ?

A lightbox is used to display any content inside a popup within a webpage, while rest of the page is greyed out and is not clickable. You may also call it greybox or thickbox. It is normally used to show subscription forms, contact forms, promotions, etc

2. The “lightbox-pop” plugin is not working properly

Please check the wordpress version you are using. Make sure it meets the minimum version recommended by us. Make sure all files of the lightbox-pop plugin are uploaded to the folder wp-content/plugins/

3. Can I use “lightbox-pop” plugin with other popup plugins ?

You can use “lightbox-pop” with any other popup related plugins from XYZScripts. However it may interfere with popup plugins from other vendors.

4. Can I add my own styles for the overlay ?

Yes, you can change the style of the overlay from the settings page. If you need to use an image for the overlay, you have to use the premium version.

5. Can I set repeat interval in minutes ?

Yes, you can set repeat interval in hours as well as minutes.

6. What kind of contents can be placed in lightbox popup?

You may use lightbox popup to display any type of contents such as special promotions, subscription forms, feedback forms, social media icons, video presentations and much more.

7. Can I display lightbox popup in specific pages only ?

Yes, you can do this by using the shortcode provided from settings page.

8. Does “lightbox-pop” work with caching plugins ?

You can turn on compatibility with cache plugins from settings page. Please note that since this method uses ajax, the popup will be a rendered a bit slower than in normal mode.

9. Can I create multiple lightboxes for different pages ?

You need to purchase the premium version for having this feature. The premium version can be purchased from our site xyzscripts.com.

10. Is the lightbox popup responsive ?

Yes, you can configure responsive popup by specifying height and width in percentage. You need to ensure from your end that the content inside the lightbox is also responsive.

11. Can I disable lightbox for logged in users ?

Yes, you can configure it by changing the value of “Do not show popup for logged in users ?” in settings page.

More questions ? Drop a mail and we shall get back to you with the answers.
sections.changelog:
2.3.3

  • Minor bug fix.

2.3.2

  • Option to exclude popup for logged in users.
  • Option to change popup background opacity.

2.3.1

  • Nonces added
  • Data validations updated
  • Direct access prevented in all plugin files
  • the_editor() changed to wp_editor()
  • get_currentuserinfo() changed to wp_get_current_user()
  • ‘htmledit_pre’ hook changed to ‘format_for_editor’ for fixing Tinymce formatting issue
  • A few other bug fixes

More

  • see changelog.txt

short_description: Create a simple, non-annoying, responsive lightbox  popup in your blog.

upgrade_notice.2.0: Version 2.0 lets you configure 2 additional display modes namely dialog box and quick box in addition to the default lightbox. It also gives more control on positioning.
upgrade_notice.1.1: Version 1.1 lets you configure lightbox using shortcode. It also has close button option in addition to closing based on overlay clicking. Also you can now specify the lightbox repeat interval in hours or minutes.

screenshots.caption: This is the configuration page where you can modify all the settings related to Lightbox Pop.
Sample lightbox popup which has a subscription form.
